issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Convert ArrowError to ParquetError
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4525](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4525). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to enable conversion from ArrowError to ParquetError. This is useful when integrating arrow with parquet, e.g. when reading parquet data into arrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4525?focusedCommentId=16765491) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3603
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3603>
